description:
The Tempo Overcurve R5 is quick-fit road cycling shoe to suit every rider and every ride. Versatile enough to make every ride enjoyable. It has a staggered, asymmetric collar that wraps your ankle and the natural misalignment of your bony protrusions: the lateral and medial malleoli. The throat of the shoe curves from the outside to the inside of your foot, and closes fast and secure with a dial and Velcro strap.

  • Overcurve asymmetric construction ergonomically conforms to the foot’s anatomy
  • Durable Microtex upper is supple yet strong
  • BOA IP1-B dial lets you dial in the feel
  • R5 carbon-reinforced nylon composite outsole balances comfort and pedalling efficiency
name: Fizik Tempo R5 Overcurve Cycling Shoes - Unisex
